attributes.action: call a General Election  to allow Britain to choose a Prime Minister if the elected Prime Minister stands down.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The British people vote for the party to form a government based on many criteria. But the main one is who will be their Prime Minister. No one voted for the Labour Party to form a government with Gordon Brown MP as party leader and Prime Minister. 
This petition is to call for giving the British people a say in who leads them, as is proper in a democracy.

rejection.details: This is very similar to http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/NotBrown/ Please consider signing this before re-submitting.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
